product.name: Mac & Cheese
product.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

product.name: Margherita Pizza
product.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

product.name: Caesar Salad
